description: The historical values of the CVG_MEMBER_STAT_OUTST_ACT table over time.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: CVD_STAT_OUTST_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The covered status outstanding action category ID for this member on the coverage record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Special Enrollment Period Verification


Binder Payment


Enrollment Geographic Area Verification


Non-Covered Subscriber

columns.name: CVD_STAT_OUTST_ACT_RES_C_NAME
columns.description:
The covered status outstanding action resolution category ID for this member on the coverage record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Resolved


Approved


Denied


Canceled


Paid


Failed To Pay


Geographic Area Verification Passed


Subscriber Gained Coverage


Resolved


Under Investigation


Temporary Address


In Geographic Area


Out of Geographic Area

columns.name: APN_QUAL_EVNT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The covered status outstanding action qualifying event category ID for this member on the coverage record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: QUALIFYING_EVENT_DATE
columns.description: The qualifying event date for this outstanding action for the member on the coverage record.

columns.name: CVD_STATUS_OUTST_ACT_LOC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the action was added to the coverage in the local time zone.

columns.name: CVD_STATUS_OUTST_ACTION_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the action was added to the coverage in UTC time.

columns.name: CVD_STAT_OUT_ACT_RES_LOC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the resolution was last changed in the local time zone.

columns.name: CVD_STATUS_OUTST_ACT_RES_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the resolution was last changed in UTC.

columns.name: CVD_STAT_OUT_ACT_DENIAL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The covered status outstanding action denial reason on the coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: ITM_HX_START_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The start instant of when the coverage/line combination is valid in local time.

columns.name: ITM_HX_START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The start instant of when the coverage/line combination is valid in UTC.

columns.name: ITM_HX_END_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The end instant of when the coverage/line combination is valid in local time.

columns.name: ITM_HX_END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The end instant of when the coverage/line combination is valid in UTC.

columns.name: CVG_ITM_HX_REL_ACT_GUID
columns.description: This ID links this audit batch to one or more actions in the coverage action history table.
